name: velvet

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: categories
variants.description: Number of channels which can be handled independently

variants.name: maxkmerlength
variants.description: Longest kmer size you can use in an analysis

variants.name: bigassembly
variants.description: Allow assemblies with more than 2^31 reads

variants.name: vbigassembly
variants.description: Allow unsigned 64-bit array index values (also enables bigassembly)

description:
Velvet is a de novo genomic assembler specially designed for short read
sequencing technologies.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.

dependent_to.name: biopieces
dependent_to.description:
The Biopieces are a collection of bioinformatics tools that can be
pieced together in a very easy and flexible manner to perform both
simple and complex tasks.

dependent_to.name: phyluce
dependent_to.description:
phyluce (phy-loo-chee) is a software package that was initially
developed for analyzing data collected from ultraconserved elements in
organismal genomes

dependent_to.name: velvetoptimiser
dependent_to.description: Automatically optimise three of Velvet's assembly parameters.
